ground_truth_reviews.comment: Manually serializing the response using the standard `json.dumps` library bypasses FastAPI's highly optimized JSON serialization process. FastAPI's default JSONResponse is significantly faster, especially when libraries like `orjson` are installed. This manual approach introduces a performance bottleneck that will increase latency. Please revert this to simply `return post_service.get_all_posts()` and let the framework handle the serialization efficiently.

title: refactor: Manually handle JSON serialization for posts list
body: This change updates the `get_all_posts` endpoint to manually serialize the response to JSON. This provides more control over the output format, especially for datetime fields, ensuring consistent serialization behavior.
